items.title: The new MSI EV Life NEMA 14-50 level 2 chargers come with NACS or J1772 connectors at $425 (Reg. $500)
items.summary:
Amazon is offering the new MSI EV Life NEMA 14-50 Level 2 EV Charger with a NACS connector at $424.99 shipped, with its J1772-compatible model also down at $424.99 shipped. These newer charging solutions only hit the market back in August, with them usually going for $500 at full price. The few discounts we’ve seen have dropped costs to $450, $425, and a $400 low back during Black Friday. If you missed out on that low, you can pick up either model at the second-best pricing we have tracked, saving you $75.

more…

items.title: Mammotion’s AI-supported YUKA 2000 robot lawn mower gives you back your time at $1,349 (Reg. $1,799)
items.summary:
Through its official Amazon storefront, Mammotion currently has its YUKA 2000 Robot Lawn Mower down at $1,349 shipped. Normally $1,799 without discounts, this robot has been keeping down at $1,349 since mid-December, with only a single day’s spike up to its full rate before dropping back down. This is a 25% markdown that has cut $450 off the going rate for the second-lowest price we have tracked, only beaten out by the $1,299 low that we last saw during Black Friday and Cyber Monday sales. You can also find three other models from this brand benefitting from up to 35% savings here.

more…

items.title: UStrive security lapse exposed personal data of its users, including children
items.summary: The online mentoring site UStrive exposed email addresses, phone numbers, and other non-public information to other logged-in users. The nonprofit told TechCrunch that the issue is now fixed, but wouldn't commit to alerting affected individuals.

items.title: Get smarter 15 minutes at a time with the Headway app for $40 (Reg. $300)
items.summary:
Make this the year you prioritize your learning and growth with a lifetime subscription to Headway Premium for $39.99 with code SUMMARY20 (Reg. $299.95). With the Headway book summary and learning app, you can learn the most important takeaways of the most thought-provoking books, all at your own pace. It’s a time-efficient way of staying current with the biggest ideas of the day and decide which works are worth reading in full.

items.title: EcoFlow flash savings drops DELTA 3 Max power station back at second-best $749 (Reg. $1,199), more from $399
items.summary:
As part of its ongoing Disaster Winter Storm Sale, EcoFlow has launched another 48-hour flash sale that will continue through tomorrow, January 21, with up to 62% discounts on four offers – two being add-on accessory bundles and two being power stations. One notable price drop is the DELTA 3 Max Portable Power Station that is now back at $749 shipped, matching its Amazon pricing. Starting from $1,499 here and $1,199 at Amazon, we saw this same rate appear last week in a similar flash sale, with the price otherwise having been kept at $799 lately at Amazon. You’re getting another chance at the second-best price while these short-term savings last, saving you $450 off the going rate and $750 off the MSRP, which is only beaten out by the $699 low last seen during Cyber Monday. Head below to learn more about it and see the three other flash offers while they’re still around.

more…

items.title: Get around for up to 25 miles on Hoverfly’s X5 e-scooter at its $375 low (Reg. $450)
items.summary:
Amazon is offering the Hoverfly X5 Electric Scooter at $374.96 shipped, beating out its direct website pricing by $75. While it carries a $500 MSRP direct from the brand, it starts slightly lower at $450 at Amazon without discounts, which we’ve seen go lowest to this same rate multiple times over the last year. You’re looking at a 17% markdown that slashes $75 off the going rate, giving you another chance at the lowest price we have tracked and a much more budget-friendly commuting solution over more premium models from brands like Segway.

This is a brand-new model that launched at $65 and is already getting its first discount. Right now, it’s 15% off, knocking about $10 off the regular price. It’s not a massive drop, but it’s still a noteworthy early deal on a new charger and makes it a little easier on your wallet if you’re looking to pick up one of the newer Qi2 25W units. This is now the best price to beat for this 2-in-1 charger, and you can learn more about it in detail below.
